biography_text: WALKER, Bradley Mark, a Representative from North Carolina; born in Dothan, Houston County, Ala., May 20, 1969; attended Trinity Baptist College, Jacksonville, Fla., 1987-1988; B.A., Piedmont International University, Winston-Salem, N.C., 1999; businessman; minister; elected as a Republican to the One Hundred Fourteenth and to the succeeding Congress (January 3, 2015-present).
